pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pepdbagent`pepdbagent` is a Python library and toolkit that gives a user-friendly interface to connect, upload, update and retrieve information from pep-db.**pep-db** is a postgres database created for storing [PEPs](http://pep.databio.org/en/latest/). It is a backend database for PEPhub. Before using pepdbagent, you should install or have access to a pep-db instance.To run a pep-db instance, you can use this tutorial:- [pep-db installation](./docs/db_tutorial.md)Then, follow the `pepdbagent` tutorial here:- [pedbagent](./docs/README.md)
